description: Numbers whose set of base 5 digits is {1,3}.
comments: Or, Numbers all of whose base 5 digits are odd.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..2500] | Set(IntegerToSequence(n, 5)) subset {1, 3}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 01 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
